snippet: Application software developers rank 72nd out of 749 occupations tracked by the government in terms of job growth to 2020. Here is a range of those job projections, which were made in 2010, just as the apps era was beginning in earnest.
lead_paragraph: Application software developers rank 72nd out of 749 occupations tracked by the government in terms of job growth to 2020. Here is a range of those job projections, which were made in 2010, just as the apps era was beginning in earnest.
